DESCRIPTION: Encode a card. NL When 3 cards are Encoded, their effects (other than Encode) are merged into a Function that costs #b1 [REMOVE_SPACE].
An effect that triggers when this card is merged into a Function. NL Can be a negative effect, which is referred to as an 'Error'.
Do not lose Block at the end of the turn.
Shuffle a card into your draw pile.
Discard a card, drawing a new card to replace it.
